channel.title: [PI] Rename monster and change level
channel.description: I already know how to change the monsters stats. I made a boss out of Greater Demon and made him hard to kill when i put him in the spawn-cfg. I want to rename him Demon Boss or something like that. I also want to change his level's number to something high so noobies don't go "Ooo look a low level boss" "WTF IM DEAD?! It killed me :(". Any help?

item.title: [PI] Rename monster and change level
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

Thx guys. Superman I realize your really helpful your now on my “coders to look up to list”. (No, I don’t write it down that would be nerdy lol) (:

EDIT: It wasn’t in Entity it was in Entitydef but still I wouldn’t have known were to start looking if it weren’t for you. :3

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Rename monster and change level
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

npc.cfg for the level.

Entity.java client-sided for the renaming.

Read full topic
